segments.text: Hello , is that the Peace Restaurant ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I'd like a table for six at 7:00 this evening . Can you arrange it for us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just a minute . I'll check if there is any availability . I'm sorry , sir . There isn't any table left for 7:00 , but we can give you one at 8: 00 . Would you like to make a reservation at that time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me see . It seems a little late .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Usually , the restaurant will be quieter at that time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . I'll change the time to 8: 00 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very good , sir . A table for 6 at 8: 00 this evening . May I have your name , please ?
segments.speaker: S2
